dec.item1: LeapMind Inc. (formerly known as AddQuality) established at Meguro-ku, Tokyo

aug.item1: Rights Offering to Mr. Kiyoshi Nishikawa, the founder of the formerly known netage,inc. performed

jun.item1: Formed a business alliance with Dentsu Isobar Inc.

aug.item1: Fund-raising of JPY 340 million in total at Series A

feb.item1: Business partnership made with GfK Japan

oct.item1: Fund-raising of JPY 1.15 billion in total at Series B

feb.item1: The head office relocated to Shibuya Dogenzaka Sky Bldg, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo

jun.item1: Hiroyuki Tokunaga was appointed as CTO

jul.item1: Launched ”DeLTA-Kit”, an evaluation kit for embedded deep learning models
jul.item2: Launched ”DeLTA-Mark”, a solution for building training data for deep learning

dec.item1: Started to release Blueoil as an open source

oct.item1: Fund-raising of JPY 3.5 billion at Series C

apr.item1: Delivered a keynote speech at ”COOL Chip 23”
apr.item2: Developed Efficiera, an ultra-low power AI accelerator IP

oct.item1: Launched the Efficiera FPGA partner program
oct.item2: Officially launched the commercial version of Efficiera, an ultra-low power AI accelerator IP

aug.item1: NEC Platforms Compact Box Controller with Ultra-Low Power AI Accelerator IP ”Efficiera”

nov.item1: Announced Ultra Low Power AI Accelerator IP ”Efficiera” v2

feb.item1: Signed a license agreement with Maxell Frontier Inc. for ultra-low power consumption AI accelerator IP ”Efficiera”

jan.item1: LeapMind's deep learning technology is adopted for AI automatic recognition of autonomous mobile robots of Okamura Co., Ltd.

jun.item1: Announced “Findra” - Flat-rate edge AI visual inspection software
